Adventure Status: Unstable 4 (12)
Date: Sunday Morning

Nox came back and sat down next to me. He picked up a peice of bacon and crunched then sipped at the coffee. "So, I wanted you to know, I've no idea what I'm doing when it comes to dating. It's not a Venatori thing as you know."

I laughed. "I guess we are even then. But you have an advantage in that I'm sure Rider has dated before."

"And I'm sure Benji has as well."

"You think I'm going to talk to Benji about dating a guy?"

"I doubt it's any different than dating a woman. I mean it's not like dating is any different between the sexes."

I shook my head. "So if I came to pick you up with roses and chocolates you'd be okay with that?"

"As opposed to what? Bring whiskey and pizza on a date with a guy?" Nox said. "I like chocolate." He said scooping a piece of crepe and berry into his mouth. I was already on my second helping. "I never understood why people like to kill flowers and give them to someone else to watch die."

"No flowers. Got it." I grinned at him. "What about jewelry?"

Nox pointed to the bells dangling from his ears. "I like jewelry. What about you? flowers, chocolate and jewelry?"

"I suppose I could do all of it. But I won't make you buy me flowers."

He put his elbow on the counter and put his chin on his hand and batted his long eyelashes. "I'd buy you flowers if you'd like them, maybe a bonsai tree or a succulent?"

"If I have to water it, it's gonna die, so let's not do anything you want me to keep alive."

Nox grinned at me, "How about I just cook for you, bring the ingredients and you eat it?"

"No honey."

"No fish."

"And we are golden." I grinned at him.

We're were seriously gonna do this thing. We were going to date. "So this isn't a date?"

"No. It wasn't out of the house. It's not asked. A date is asked, out of the house, and dropped off. Until the third then there might be a spending the night." Nox winked.

"So this Wednesday will be number one?" I asked a little disappointed.

"Yes. I can't pick you up though. I did the asking."

"Was more like telling. But it counts. And I will drive. I'm not sure I want a New Yorker driving me around."

"I can drive." Nox laughed.

"In the city. This is hardly New York."

"True." He agreed. "And I already know what we are n going to do. But I need to make sure it's possible still so I can't tell you."

"I like surprises." Nox said with a grin.

"I don't."

"That's good to know." Nox nodded like he was making a mental note. "I don't like secrets or lies."

"I gathered that." I grabbed knocking my shoulder into his. "I will do my best. Lying is sorry the stick of trade."

"Mine too. Just not in my personal life."

"Understood. I will do my best, I promise." I would likely fail. "But I might fall spectacularly."

Nox grinned at me."I'll try to keep an open mind about the reason. I'm a bit rigid in some things. A lot of things. So we'll both try, together."

For some reason that last word resonated with me. His smile, I just wanted to kiss those lips. I leaned in but a throat cleared behind me.

"No fucking in my kitchen."

Nox laughed. "There will be no fucking for a while if you must know." He winked at me and Benji blushed.

"Fucking Venatori." He said. The rounded the island we were sitting and made a second plate. "You better keep this one, even if he can't make anything else."

"Those are mine." I growled.

"It's my house." Benji countered.

Nox shifted his shoulder into mine and leaned his head against it batting his eye lashes up at me, "I can make you more anytime. Just let me stock the kitchen."

I grinned at him. "Why don't you just move everything in, and run my kitchen completely. It's a win-win for everyone. I get home cooked meals, and you get the fuck away from the murderous bastards who are trying to kill you."

Nox shrugged. "That'll die down."

"Not here it won't" Benji said with me only a step behind. I continued, "They'll fuck with you till you leave or till you die. Either way they don't care."

"Everlight is a very different city. If the Venatori don't kill you someone else will. You're an easy target if the Venatori don't protect you."

Nox laughed. "I don't need Venatori protection. I've never had it. Never needed it."

"He's kinda gotta point." I agreed. "He's already playing nice with the local vamps. Got an in with the childe of the Hound. Knows some secrets. I bet he could make nice with Il Cane and easily have run of the town."

"Even Salvatore Einor steps wide of Il Cane." Benji nodded. "He should do both."

"And you need to get your brother the fuck outta there too. He's even more defenseless."

Nox shook his head. "Rider can handle himself." But he sighed. "You aren't going to let it go are you?"

We both shook our head. "Fine. Take me home, we can drop Rider off at the Coven and you can bring me here."

"There ain't no room in Serenity for three." I said.

Benji grinned. "He cooks me dinner tonight, and you can borrow the sedan."

I rolled my eyes. "Fine." I looked to Nox and he shrugged. "That's cool with me, But Alex will have to take me shopping."

"Why don't you just leave me a list and I'll round out what we need here and buy you whatever groceries you need for Alex's. Sound good?"

"I suppose." He said. Nox didn't look thrilled with the idea, but he went with it. I'd have balked a lot more. But there was something in the way he deferred that made me concerned a bit.

He grinned at me. "I'm not that submissive."

"How..." I shook my head. "I don't wanna know. But it's good to know."
